w

my behalf to persuade
e company, that I
will be very carefull, to accomplishe their
desire: not onely by procuring
e speedy ans-
wear of
e states, but by dealing as I am
able, that their answear may content yo
w
.
Howbeit it falleth out commonly in affaires of
importance,
at
e assembly of
e states con-
sisting of certaine deputies of
e severall
Provinces, their autoritie and power is so
strictly limited by privat instructions, as
they will not alter any order,
at is prescribed
by their Principals, howsoever they be solicited.
The time prefixed of their generall meeting
is
e 20 of this moneth, in their account:
but their appearance is commonly fortnight
after: at w
ch
time I will be ready to calle
for their answear, and to perfourme what-
soever shall be further requisit.
And so
recommending my service and best affection
to yo
w
and
e Company, I c
